title: Should I switch from viola to cello? I have been playing the viola for six years, but I like the cello much more. - Quora

response.answer_text: Sure! You should switch if you like it better. I don’t know if you just play by yourself or in groups. In my opinion, the cello parts are more interesting in string quartets and n orchestra. I can’t comment on string trios, because I know very little of this literature. Cello is an awesome instrument.

absolutely! i have tried both and find the cello much more "player-friendly" and intuitive. you should make yourself happy! i play chromatic harmonica (with the button) and tenor uke, mainly, and they make me happy. unless you are attempting to make money by playing, youvshould make yourself happy too. stay well
